fieldset.legend: Play and Pause Buttons for Slideshow

div.title: Picture of a box that says Information on the May 5, 2020 election county wide enhancement millage

img.alt: Picture of a box that says Information on the May 5, 2020 election county wide enhancement millage

div.p: As a service to you, we are providing this FAQ regarding the Tuesday, May 5th election. Due to the recent concerns surrounding COVID-19, every registered voter has been mailed an absent voter ballot request form for this election in order to reduce potential exposure to the virus.
Please review the FAQ and continue to practice safe hygiene and social distancing techniques as we flatten the curve of COVID-19 for the sake of our valued Health Workers and First Responders.

p.b: Starting Tuesday, April 14th, meal distribution times will be as follows:

div.p: Multiple Meals will be distributed on these days each week. The goal is to continue to provide a safe and healthy environment while practicing safe distancing.
A list of District Announcements and Resources are on the next page.

article.a: Read More about this article about Announcements and Resources for Families

div.title: Picture of a pencil and paper with an X on it.

img.alt: Picture of a pencil and paper with an X on it.

div.p: Two 6-year terms will be filled at the November 3, 2020 General Election. -More information on the next page...

article.a: Read More about this article about Two Seats Open for Election

div.title: Picture of Calendar - Looking Ahead to the 2020-2021 School Year!

img.alt: Picture of Calendar - Looking Ahead to the 2020-2021 School Year!

div.a: 2020-2021 Dates for 1st Day of School, Winter and Spring Break

div.p: The following letter has the preliminary dates for the 1st day of school, winter and spring breaks for the 2020-2021 school year.

article.a: Read More about this article about 2020-2021 Dates for 1st Day of School, Winter and Spring Break

p.em: The Gull Lake Virtual Partnership is a program of Gull Lake Community Schools and is available to all students residing within Kalamazoo County and all school districts that are contiguous to Kalamazoo County. All classes in the traditional school, Gull Lake Virtual Partnership and Gateway Academy are available to all students enrolled in Gull Lake Schools.
